name: Quantum Ovaries
description:
This game was made in 48 hours, for the 3HILLS 2023 game jam. About:

Help Ozana, a scientist, to collect quantum ovaries to extend the biological clock.

Features:
  • Canabalt meets Flappy Bird
  • Triple jump mechanic that balances the time on the ground and in the air 
  • One button controls
  • The magic is in the knowing when to hold the button down and when to let it go
  • Risk and reward, tough as nails, satisfying gameplay
How to play: Story:

When you are growing up (and over here that means until you are 65), Slavic people have only one question for you. Until you are 25, it is "did you get your college degree". If the answer is yes, the race to 30 starts, with a new question:

When are you going to get a kid?

Ozana is a briliant scientist, but this question lingers as she nears 30. She has 8 seconds up to her 30th birthday, and has to rely on quantum magic to avoid disappointing her mom!
